archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.4.4d: d) risk treatment options (that have been agreed by executive management), such as applying appropriate security controls to mitigate risks, avoiding risks, transferring risks or accepting risks
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
